__e: No, I intend to kill you.
Well, I didn't mean to kill anyone, at first.
I want you to know I have no intention of killing you.
I do not know, Mr. Barkley, but I intend to find out.
I came to your house that day to tell you that I never meant to hurt anyone.
There's no good in pretending we're all equal... we're not all the same, never have been, never will be.
To everything there is a season, and a time for every purpose under the sun.
I always assumed that you did that for a purpose?
Thought maybe he had a purpose for me. Some shit like that.
Yes, the purpose of war is to serve a political end, but the true nature of war is to serve itself.
I've no purpose other than claiming the love that is mine!
It is our intention today to separate the girls, leaving each of them enough of the liver so that it can regenerate over time and continue normal function.
I've been sent here to determine who or what you represent and what your intentions are.
No need for violence! My intent is not to harm you.
Whatever their real agenda is,it's clear they're not sharing it.
What purpose did you serve by killing it?
But your intention wasn't to make my life better. It was to destroy me.
He told me his only purpose in life was to protect me.
Worry about your own purpose. Go... save the world, Cole.
Mother, he brought this, he must have intended to use it.
It's for a great cause, and I would be proud to go with you and show my support. Look, you've been here over a month.
Nor, will I venture, has he any intention of so doing.
Before you made me sick, I had no purpose in life, helped no one... left no mark.
Having purpose is important, but you already have one.
